text: The 2006–07 Bill Beaumont Cup (Rugby Union County Championship) was the 107th edition of England's County Championship rugby union club competition. Devon won their 10th title after defeating Lancashire in the final. The Championship was renamed the Bill Beaumont Cup in honour of Bill Beaumont. == Final == {| width="80%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |-
